name: @mozeyinedu/filter
description: @mozeyinedu/filter filters array of object with few lines of codes. It is scalable, light weight and simple to use with both simple and complex array of object of any size

scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'updated' && git push origin master
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run push && npm run publish_

author: mozey inedu
